title: Dazzling Diamond Ruby 'Addigai' Haaram with Pearl Drops - A Timeless Treasure
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: Intricate filigree work ('tara kashi pani') forms the delicate base, adorned with meticulously set diamonds. The central pendant showcases a floral motif with a Ruby centerpiece. Pearl drops ('muthyala menjalu') add a touch of traditional elegance and grace. The entire necklace follows a classic 'Addigai' choker style that cascades down, lending a regal look.
colors: with a vibrant splash of red (ruby) and the subtle sheen of pearls.
occasions: and upscale events. A statement piece that elevates any attire.
description: A stunning embodiment of South Indian heritage, handcrafted by skilled artisans. The combination of diamonds, rubies, and pearls is considered highly auspicious. The 'Addigai' style is a classic heirloom piece, designed for enduring beauty and value. High-quality materials ensure durability and a luxurious feel. An investment piece that will be treasured for generations.
